articles.title: Is Mercury hiding on Earth? Research suggests it arrived during early days of solar system - India Today
articles.description: The closest planet to the Sun has remained an enigma for scientists. New research suggests parts of this planet that once used to be super-Mercury may have arrived on Earth during the early days of the Solar System.
